fullplot: The Education of Charlie Banks is a coming of age tale that spans from the playgrounds of lower Manhattan to the idyllic greens of a fictional liberal arts college in upstate New York. Set during the eighties, it is a story about change, inevitability, and ultimately, about facing one's fears.
plot: College student Charlie Banks has to face old problems when the bully he had an unpleasant encounter with back in high school shows up on his campus.
title: The Education of Charlie Banks

tomatoes.consensus: Unevenness and earnestness mire this otherwise sweet, surprising coming of age drama.
